channel.title: Maintenance Principles on Gov's Programming Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Maintenance Principles on Gov's Programming Thoughts

item.title: Tell, don't ask
item.description: In good object oriented code, data should be bundled in the same class with the functions which operate on that data.

item.title: You Aren't Going To Need It
item.description: You should not work on new functionality before there is a requirement for it.
